channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Token Macro Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Token Macro Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10337|2024-08-04T22:17:20.365Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20token%20macro%20plugin
item.description: An XML external entities (XXE) vulnerability in Jenkins Token Macro Plugin 2.7 and earlier allowed attackers able to control a the content of the input file for the "XML" macro to have Jenkins resolve external entities, resulting in the extraction of secrets from the Jenkins agent, server-side request forgery, or denial-of-service attacks.
